rules_text:
Tyrant of the Depths has hexproof as long as it's untapped.
Whenever you cycle Tyrant of the Depths or it attacks, tap target nonland permanent you don't control and put a stun counter on it.
Basic landcycling {1}{U} [i]({1}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]
